newsitem.title: ESTONIA: LONG TERM OPTIONS ON BUY CALLS, SHORT TERM FLAT.
newsitem.headline: LONG TERM OPTIONS ON BUY CALLS, SHORT TERM FLAT.

text.p: Hansapank said on Friday that option trading was quieter at the start of the week, but a flurry of activity on Thursday revealed strong interest in long-term buy calls.
"It was very quiet until Thursday when some big long-term buy calls going though," Tonis Haavel, Hansapank's options trader, told Reuters.
"Trading on the short-term, one to two months, was inactive with almost no deals done," he added.
Options volumes during the week reached 10-11 million kroons.
The maturity date for options is the third Friday of each month. The next is due on June 20.
Hansapank also said that they will offer a new options instrument based on the Tallinn Stock exchange index from May 26.
